1384: Clara was born in Cingel in 1384.
Lost sibling Iris in 1384 when Iris was 10.
1391: Lost mother at the age of 7.
Diewiven took care of Clara since Clara was 8.
1394: Lost sibling Lubertus in 1394 when Lubertus was 18.
Lost sibling Diewiven in 1394 when Diewiven was 17.
Wissen took care of Clara since Clara was 11.
1398: Lost father at the age of 14.
Became caretaker of Woubbrecht at age 15.
1399: Got married to Galo at age 16 in 1399.
Clara moved to Cromme straet.D.10 after marriage.
Became caretaker of Boidin, Wijfgode, Salome, Meynolphus at age 16.
Moved in with husband Galo after marriage.
